content.prompt: The change in the total number of athletes shown in the graph circa 1932 was most directly a result of the

choices.label: spread of Cold War proxy conflicts in Africa and Asia
lingering effects of a global economic depression
creation of new nations after the First World War
success of the Bolshevik Revolution in Russia

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
